Package ‘shinythemes’
November 6, 2018
Title Themes for Shiny
Version 1.1.2

#### Description
 Themes for use with Shiny. Includes several Bootstrap themes
from <http://bootswatch.com/>, which are packaged for use with Shiny
applications.
Depends R (>= 3.0.0)
Imports shiny (>= 0.11)
URL http://rstudio.github.io/shinythemes/
